column1: Table 1a: Sexual Identity by Region and Country, United Kingdom, 2012 to 2022 (thousands)
This worksheet contains one table. The table contains population estimates by sexual identity, for each English region and country of the UK.
Totals may not sum due to rounding.
'Other' means that the respondent did not consider themselves to fit into the heterosexual or straight, bisexual, gay or lesbian categories.
Estimates are based on the household population.
Some cells refer to notes which can be found in the notes worksheet.
Symbols are used in this worksheet. The meaning of each symbol can be found on the cover sheet.
